item.title: 亚马逊北卡罗来纳州员工拒绝加入工会，零售商在劳工斗争中获胜
item.description: 北卡罗来纳州的亚马逊工人周六投票反对加入工会，这对这家零售巨头来说是一个重大胜利，因为它一直极力反对在全美各地的工厂组织工会。【原文：Amazon workers in North Carolina voted on Saturday against joining a union, a big win for the retail giant which has vigorously opposed organized labor at its facilities across the United States.】

item.title: 根据新规定，加拿大银行必须披露董事会和高层管理人员的多样性
item.description: 根据周六公布的新规定，加拿大银行和其他国家机构必须披露其董事会和高层管理人员的多样性信息，这与美国特朗普政府终止此类做法形成了鲜明对比。【原文：Canadian banks and other national institutions have to disclose information about the diversity of their boards of directors and top management under new rules published on Saturday, in sharp contrast with the U.S. Trump administration which is ending such practices.】

item.title: 北卡罗来纳州亚马逊工会候选人指控选举计票受到干扰
item.description: 北卡罗来纳州一个新成立的工会声称，亚马逊周六在罗利附近的一个仓库干扰了计票过程。【原文：An upstart union in North Carolina alleged Amazon interfered with the vote counting process on Saturday at a warehouse near Raleigh.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，苹果旨在为 Vision Pro 带来人工智能功能和空间内容应用程序
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周六报道，苹果公司正计划为其 Vision Pro 头戴式耳机添加苹果智能，并最早于 4 月份更新访客用户模式和空间内容应用程序。【原文：Apple is planning to add Apple Intelligence to its Vision Pro headset, along with an updated mode for guest users and a spatial content app as early as April, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 特朗普参观波音飞机，强调新空军一号迟迟未到位
item.description: 白宫表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统周六参观了一架波音飞机，以强调空军一号新飞机交付的延误。【原文：President Donald Trump toured a Boeing plane on Saturday to highlight delays in delivering new Air Force One aircraft, said the White House.】

item.title: 巴库钢铁公司、金达尔公司成为收购意大利伊尔瓦公司的领跑者
item.description: 意大利政府周六表示，巴库钢铁公司和金达尔国际钢铁公司已经提高了对Acciaierie d'Italia（ADI）（前称Ilva）的出价，使它们成为该工厂竞标的领跑者。【原文：Baku Steel Company and Jindal Steel International have raised their bids for Acciaierie d'Italia (ADI), formerly known as Ilva, the Italian government said on Saturday, making them the frontrunners in the bidding for the plant.】

item.title: 优步在诉讼中指责 DoorDash 的反竞争行为
item.description: Uber Technologies 对 DoorDash 提起诉讼，指控这家在线外卖公司采取反竞争做法，导致餐厅和顾客的成本上升。【原文：Uber Technologies has filed a lawsuit against DoorDash, accusing the online delivery firm of anticompetitive practices, leading to higher costs for both restaurants and customers.】

item.title: 商业内幕》称，大众汽车将大众品牌内部利润率目标设定为 6.5
item.description: 新闻网站 Business Insider 援引其获得的文件称，德国汽车制造商大众汽车已发布内部目标，将大众汽车业务的销售利润率从之前报道的约 2% 提高到 6.5%。【原文：German carmaker Volkswagen has issued internal targets to improve the profit margin for sales from its VW car business to 6.5%, up from about 2% previously reported, news website Business Insider said, citing documents it obtained.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔认为美国提高关税对通胀影响不大
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）的一位高层决策者表示，美国提高对欧洲出口商品的关税可能不会对欧元区的通胀产生什么影响，并补充说，主要风险仍然是中期通胀率低于 2%。【原文：Higher U.S. tariffs on European exports are likely to have little effect on euro area inflation, a top European Central Bank policymaker said, adding the main risk remained that of medium-term inflation falling below 2%.】

item.title: 台湾官员称芯片业无需一国控制
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）批评台湾岛内的芯片主导地位后，台湾最高科技官员周六表示，半导体行业非常复杂，需要分工合作，没有必要由一个国家来控制。【原文：There is no need for one country to control the semiconductor industry, which is complex and needs a division of labour, Taiwan's top technology official said on Saturday after U.S. President Donald Trump criticised the island's chip dominance.】

item.title: 美国季度文件显示，基金经理增持比特币 ETF
item.description: 根据最近的监管文件，从财富管理公司到对冲基金和养老基金等资产管理公司都在2024年第四季度提高了与比特币价格挂钩的美国交易所交易基金的配置，因为这种世界上最大的加密货币的价格飙升了47%。【原文：Asset managers, ranging from wealth management companies to hedge funds and pension funds, boosted allocations to U.S. exchange-traded funds tied to the price of bitcoin in the fourth quarter of 2024, as the price of the world's largest cryptocurrency soared 47%, according to recent regulatory filings.】

item.title: Peloton 赢得股东对座椅支柱召回诉讼的撤诉
item.description: Peloton Interactive 公司周五赢得了一项拟议的股东集体诉讼的撤诉，该诉讼指控这家健身器材制造商隐瞒了与安全有关的问题，导致 2023 年 5 月召回了 220 万辆自行车，因为有报告称这些自行车的座杆存在缺陷。【原文：Peloton Interactive on Friday won the dismissal of a proposed shareholder class action lawsuit accusing the fitness equipment maker of concealing safety-related problems that led to a May 2023 recall of 2.2 million bikes following reports of defective seat posts.】

item.title: 阿克曼的公司在第四季度增持耐克，减持 Chipotle
item.description: 据周五提交的一份监管文件显示，亿万富翁投资者威廉-阿克曼（William Ackman）在第四季度增持了体育用品公司耐克（Nike）15%的股份，并减持了快餐连锁店墨西哥烤肉店（Chipotle Mexican Grill）14%的股份。【原文：Billionaire investor William Ackman increased his stake in sportswear company Nike by 15% and cut his investment in fast-casual food chain Chipotle Mexican Grill by 14%, during the fourth quarter, according to a regulatory filing made on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普和马斯克的裁员对美国机构的影响有多大？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和他最亲密的顾问之一、亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）发起了一场大刀阔斧的运动，以削减 230 万联邦员工的规模，本周至少解雇了 9,500 名员工，这一史无前例的努力没有任何放缓的迹象。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump and billionaire Elon Musk, one of his closest advisers, have mounted a sweeping campaign to slash the size of the 2.3 million-strong federal workforce, firing at least 9,500 employees this week in an unprecedented effort that shows no sign of slowing.】

item.title: 通用汽车关闭在华工厂作为重组的一部分
item.description: 据通用汽车公司一位消息人士透露，该公司将于本月关闭位于中国东北部城市沈阳的一家工厂，这也是该公司在华重组的一部分。【原文：General Motors is closing a plant this month in the northeastern Chinese city of Shenyang as part of the U.S. automaker's restructuring in China, according to a company source.】

item.title: 摩根大通预计其 DEI 政策将受到批评
item.description: 摩根大通周五向监管机构提交的文件显示，摩根大通预计其一些业务实践将面临批评，其中包括多元化、公平和包容性（DEI）。【原文：JPMorgan Chase expects to face criticism on some of its business practices, including diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI), according to its regulatory filing on Friday.】

item.title: 马修斯宣布治理变革，董事会斗争投票迫在眉睫
item.description: 马修斯国际公司（Matthews International）周五宣布了一系列公司治理改革措施，目的是在股东在激烈的董事会投票前不到一周的时间里，推高这家棺材制造商的股价。【原文：Matthews International on Friday announced a number of corporate governance changes aimed at pushing up the casket maker's stock price less than a week before shareholders cast votes in a bitter boardroom battle.】

item.title: 特朗普继续加征关税，下一个目标是汽车
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五继续发出关税威胁，称最快将于 4 月 2 日对汽车征收关税。【原文：President Donald Trump on Friday kept alive his drumbeat of tariff threats, saying levies on automobiles would be coming as soon as April 2, the day after members of his cabinet are due to deliver reports to him outlining options for a range of import duties as he seeks to reshape global trade.】

item.title: OpenAI 董事会拒绝马斯克 974 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: OpenAI 周五拒绝了亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）领导的财团以 974 亿美元收购这家 ChatGPT 制造商的出价，称这家初创公司是非卖品。【原文：OpenAI on Friday rejected a $97.4 billion bid from a consortium led by billionaire Elon Musk for the ChatGPT maker, saying the startup is not for sale.】

item.title: 伯克希尔收购星座品牌，减持大型银行股份
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）周五披露了对酒精饮料生产商星座品牌公司（Constellation Brands）的新投资，并表示已经减持了花旗集团和美国银行的股票。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway on Friday disclosed a new investment in alcoholic beverages producer Constellation Brands , and said it has reduced its holdings in Citigroup and Bank of America .】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官将于 4 月 2 日在美国参议院商务小组作证
item.description: 美国参议院商业委员会主席、共和党参议员特德-克鲁兹（Ted Cruz）周五表示，波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）将于4月2日在该委员会作证。【原文：Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg will testify on April 2 before the U.S. Senate Commerce Committee, the panel's chair, Republican Senator Ted Cruz, said on Friday.】

item.title: 美联储主席洛根呼吁即使通胀降温也要谨慎对待降息
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）周五重申了她的观点，即即使未来几个月通胀率接近美联储2%的目标，美国央行也不一定要降低短期借贷成本作为回应。 "洛根在南卫理公会大学（Southern Methodist University）于加利福尼亚州棕榈沙漠（Palm Desert）举办的银行业会议上说："我认为，目前货币政策的限制性程度确实存在问题。"因此，我认为我们需要谨慎行事。【原文：Dallas Federal Reserve Bank President Lorie Logan on Friday reiterated her view that even if inflation nears the Fed's 2% goal in coming months, the U.S. central bank should not necessarily reduce short-term borrowing costs in response. "I think there's a real question about how restrictive monetary policy is right now," Logan said at a banking conference hosted by Southern Methodist University in Palm Desert, California. "And so I think we need to be cautious."】

item.title: 据 Axios 报道，TikTok 竞标者直接与白宫而非 ByteDance 交谈
item.description: 据 Axios 周五报道，有意收购短视频应用 TikTok 的竞标者正直接与白宫而非其中国所有者字节跳动进行谈判。【原文：Bidders interested in buying the short-video app TikTok are talking directly with the White House, and not with its Chinese owner ByteDance, Axios reported on Friday.】

item.title: 法官延长埃隆-马斯克的 DOGE 进入财政部系统的期限
item.description: 周五，一名美国法官延长了对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的政府成本削减团队（被称为 DOGE）的临时禁令，禁止其访问负责数万亿美元支付的财政部系统。【原文：A U.S. judge on Friday extended a temporary block on Elon Musk's government cost-cutting team, known as DOGE, from accessing Treasury Department systems responsible for trillions of dollars in payments.】

item.title: 文件显示，对冲基金维京买入波音股票
item.description: 周五提交的一份监管文件显示，总部位于美国的对冲基金维京全球（Viking Global）在第四季度对飞机制造商波音公司建立了价值 5.26 亿美元的新头寸，持有 290 万股。【原文：U.S.-based hedge fund Viking Global built a $526 million-worth new position in planemaker Boeing in the fourth quarter, with 2.9 million shares, a regulatory filing showed on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普对美国收益率的关注助长了对银行杠杆率规则审查的押注
item.description: 特朗普政府承诺控制美国长期国债收益率，这增强了债券市场的预期，即人们期待已久的银行杠杆率要求监管转变可能最终迫在眉睫。【原文：The Trump administration's pledge to contain long-term U.S. Treasury yields has strengthened bond market expectations that a long-desired regulatory shift on bank leverage requirements could be finally looming.】

item.title: 特朗普表示不介意新日铁持有美国钢铁公司少数股份
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，他不介意日本新日铁公司持有美国钢铁公司的少数股份。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday said he wouldn't mind if Japan's Nippon Steel took a minority stake in U.S. Steel .】

item.title: 特朗普称将于 4 月 2 日前后征收汽车关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，他计划在 4 月 2 日前后对进口汽车征收关税。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Friday he plans to impose tariffs on imported cars around April 2.】

item.title: 拜登停摆后，特朗普政府开始批准液化天然气出口
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府周五表示，已批准路易斯安那州英联邦液化天然气公司（Commonwealth LNG）出口液化天然气，这是继去年年初前总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）暂停出口液化天然气后，首次批准出口这种资源。【原文：The administration of President Donald Trump said on Friday it has granted a license to export liquefied natural gas for Commonwealth LNG in Louisiana, the first approval of exports of the resource after former President Joe Biden paused them early last year.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：应特朗普团队要求，台积电考虑运营英特尔美国工厂
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，应美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）官员的要求，台湾合约制造商台积电正在考虑控股芯片制造商英特尔（Intel）的工厂。【原文：Taiwanese contract manufacturer TSMC is considering taking a controlling stake in chipmaker Intel's factories at the request of U.S. President Donald Trump's officials, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】
